words.source: H1121 (בֵּן, 'son'), conjunction + noun common masculine plural construct; KJV 'And the sons of', ESV 'The sons of', NASB 'The sons of'
H4847 (מְרָרִי, 'Merari'), proper noun; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Merari'
H4249 (מַחְלִי, 'Mahli'), proper noun; KJV 'Mahali', ESV 'Mahli', NASB 'Mahli'
H4187 (מוּשִׁי, 'Mushi'), conjunction + proper noun; KJV 'and Mushi', ESV 'and Mushi', NASB 'and Mushi'
H428 (אֵלֶּה, 'these'), demonstrative pronoun common plural; KJV 'these are', ESV 'these are', NASB 'these are'
H4940 (מִשְׁפָּחָה, 'clan/family'), noun common feminine plural construct; KJV 'the families of', ESV 'the clans of', NASB 'the families of'
H3878 (לֵוִי, 'Levi'), article + proper noun; KJV 'Levi', ESV 'Levi', NASB 'Levi'

H8435 (תּוֹלְדוֹת, 'generations'), preposition-lamed + noun common feminine plural construct + 3mp suffix; KJV 'according to their generations', ESV 'according to their generations', NASB 'according to their generations'
